options.name: Reaction : Parting Shot
options.description: When a hostile within very short range (5 units) moves farther from you, you may make a throwing or simple ranged attack against it as a reaction.

options.name: Guerrilla Fighter
options.description: Gain +1 skill with stealth. If you end your turn within 1 unit of cover, you can reposition yourself that additional unit assuming you are able to move. This type of movement does not provoke reactions.

options.name: Field Scout
options.description: Gain +1 skill with senses. While you are hidden, your senses checks roll with a bonus die.

options.name: Hard Pivot
options.description: Gain +1 skill with concentration. When you take the Sprint action, you may make a single 90Â° turn during that movement.

options.name: Action : Running Toss
options.description: You move up to 3 units, then make a throwing attack. This attack rolls with a bonus die.

options.name: Action : Skirmish
options.description: You make a weapon attack with a simple melee weapon or a brawling strike, then immediately move up to 3 units without provoking reactions.

options.name: Fleet Footwork
options.description: Gain +1 skill with coordination and +1 movement speed.

options.name: Throwing Mastery
options.description: Gain +1 skill with throwing weapons. Your minimum optimal range with throwing weapons is reduced by 1 step, letting you throw effectively at one range closer without penalties.

options.name: Flow of Battle
options.description: After you make an attack with a simple melee weapon, a brawling strike, or a throwing weapon, you may move 1 unit. This movement does not provoke reactions. You can use this feature up to 3 times per round.
